brand_purpose.audience: Queensland SMEs, 30-55, $100K-$2M revenue, time-poor, job: keep visible, pain: invisible online, gain: stay seen
brand_purpose.motivations:
20% sales growth, 10 hours/week saved, standout digital presence.  
Your audience is motivated by simplicity, credibility, real results, and the freedom to focus on what they do best‚Äîwhile their marketing runs itself.
brand_purpose.painPoints:
‚Ä¢  Growth and Sales: They want to pack their shops, boost revenue, and see measurable wins, like more foot traffic or online orders. 
‚Ä¢  Time Freedom: They crave tools that save time, letting them focus on running their business, not wrestling with social media. 
‚Ä¢  Local Fame: They dream of being the go-to spot in their community, outshining competitors with a standout, authentic online vibe.

goals.keyMessage: Launching The AgencyIQ Social Media automation that does your social media strategy, plan and posts every 30 days in just 10 minutes.  The simple subscription options, auto-generated waterfall strategy using business and brand principles to write your brand purpose, auto-generate your social media schedule, and post to your platforms.  Take control of your socials now.  https://app.theagencyiq.ai
